snippet.title: Carmen Sandiego | Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Gameloft and HarperCollins Productions are excited to announce their upcoming title and the return of the iconic master thief — Carmen Sandiego. The infamous globetrotter is back with the first major relaunch of this beloved game, poised to debut exclusively on Netflix, followed by Nintendo Switch, PlayStation, Xbox, and Steam later in Q1 of 2025.

Wishlist today at https://www.carmensandiego-game.com

Find out more on: 

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/theofficialcarmensandiego
X/Twitter: https://twitter.com/CarmenSandiego
Facebook:  https://www.facebook.com/carmensandiego/ 

***
© 2024 Gameloft. All Rights Reserved
